sn22.59:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava baranasiyam viharati isipatane migadaye.
sn22.59:1.2: Tatra kho bhagava pancavaggiye bhikkhu amantesi:
sn22.59:2.2: Rupanca hidam, bhikkhave, atta abhavissa, nayidam rupam abadhaya samvatteyya, labbhetha ca rupe:
sn22.59:2.3: ‘evam me rupam hotu, evam me rupam ma ahosi’ti.
sn22.59:2.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, rupam anatta, tasma rupam abadhaya samvattati, na ca labbhati rupe:
sn22.59:2.5: ‘evam me rupam hotu, evam me rupam ma ahosi’ti.
sn22.59:3.2: Vedana ca hidam, bhikkhave, atta abhavissa, nayidam vedana abadhaya samvatteyya, labbhetha ca vedanaya:
sn22.59:3.3: ‘evam me vedana hotu, evam me vedana ma ahosi’ti.
sn22.59:3.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, vedana anatta, tasma vedana abadhaya samvattati, na ca labbhati vedanaya:
sn22.59:3.5: ‘evam me vedana hotu, evam me vedana ma ahosi’ti.
sn22.59:4.3: Sankhara ca hidam, bhikkhave, atta abhavissamsu, nayidam sankhara abadhaya samvatteyyum, labbhetha ca sankharesu:
sn22.59:4.4: ‘evam me sankhara hontu, evam me sankhara ma ahesun’ti.
sn22.59:4.5: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, sankhara anatta, tasma sankhara abadhaya samvattanti, na ca labbhati sankharesu:
sn22.59:4.6: ‘evam me sankhara hontu, evam me sankhara ma ahesun’ti.
sn22.59:5.2: Vinnananca hidam, bhikkhave, atta abhavissa, nayidam vinnanam abadhaya samvatteyya, labbhetha ca vinnane:
sn22.59:5.3: ‘evam me vinnanam hotu, evam me vinnanam ma ahosi’ti.
sn22.59:5.4: Yasma ca kho, bhikkhave, vinnanam anatta, tasma vinnanam abadhaya samvattati, na ca labbhati vinnane:
sn22.59:5.5: ‘evam me vinnanam hotu, evam me vinnanam ma ahosi’ti.
sn22.59:6.4: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn22.59:6.6: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn22.59:6.14: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn22.59:6.16: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn22.59:7.1: “Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, yam kinci rupam atitanagatapaccuppannam ajjhattam va bahiddha va olarikam va sukhumam va hinam va panitam va yam dure santike va, sabbam rupam: ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.59:8.1: Ya kaci vedana atitanagatapaccuppanna ajjhatta va bahiddha va …pe… ya dure santike va, sabba vedana: ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.59:9.2: ye keci sankhara atitanagatapaccuppanna ajjhattam va bahiddha va …pe… ye dure santike va, sabbe sankhara: ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.59:10.1: Yam kinci vinnanam atitanagatapaccuppannam ajjhattam va bahiddha va olarikam va sukhumam va hinam va panitam va yam dure santike va, sabbam vinnanam: ‘netam mama, nesohamasmi, na meso atta’ti evametam yathabhutam sammappannaya datthabbam.
sn22.59:11.1: Evam passam, bhikkhave, sutava ariyasavako rupasmimpi nibbindati, vedanayapi nibbindati, sannayapi nibbindati, sankharesupi nibbindati, vinnanasmimpi nibbindati.
sn22.59:11.2: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati. Vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn22.59:11.3: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
sn22.59:12.2: Attamana pancavaggiya bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandum.
sn22.59:12.3: Imasminca pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane pancavaggiyanam bhikkhunam anupadaya asavehi cittani vimuccimsuti.
